About This Page

The "Group Comment Delete" page allows authors of comments, owner of the group, and Super Admins to delete one any applicable group wall comments. You can pass a comment ID in the URI or you can hard code it using the 'comment_id' template parameter

It makes use of the following functions:

  • Friends:Group_Comment_Delete to delete a group wall comment.
